mapper.select: select A.employee_id as id, A.first_name as firstName, A.last_name as lastName, A.hire_date as hireDate, A.salary as salary, A.job_id as "job.id", B.department_name as "department.name" from employees A, departments B where A.department_id = B.department_id(+) and A.job_id = #{value} order by A.employee_id asc

select A.employee_id as id, A.first_name as firstName, A.last_name as lastName, A.hire_date as hireDate, A.salary as salary, B.department_name as "department.name" from employees A, departments B where A.department_id = B.department_id(+) and A.department_id = #{value} order by A.employee_id asc
mapper.insert: insert into employees (employee_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number, hire_date, job_id, salary, commission_pct, manager_id, department_id) values (employees_seq.nextval, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, #{hireDate}, #{job.id}, #{salary}, #{commissionPct}, #{manager.id}, #{department.id})
